entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending overnight then partly cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
